hook.text: PleasrDAO is a collective of crypto investors that buys culturally significant digital and physical artworks.

buildup.text: They purchased an Edward Snowden NFT for $5.4 million and the original Doge meme photo for $4 million.

discovery.text: PleasrDAO fractionalized the Doge NFT into billions of DOG tokens. Anyone could own a piece of the meme.

twist.text: They also bought a one-of-a-kind Wu-Tang Clan album that was previously owned by the convicted pharma executive Martin Shkreli.

climax.text: PleasrDAO proved that collective ownership of cultural artifacts is possible â€” and can be wildly fun.

punchline.text: A group of strangers bought the Doge meme and a Wu-Tang Clan album.

quiz.question: What notable item did PleasrDAO purchase?
options: The original Doge meme photo for $4 million
